add_library(libcrypto SHARED ${SOURCE_FILES})
target_include_directories(libcrypto
        PRIVATE src/crypto
        PUBLIC src/include
        )
target_compile_definitions(libcrypto PRIVATE
        -DBORINGSSL_ANDROID_SYSTEM
        -DBORINGSSL_SHARED_LIBRARY
        -DBORINGSSL_IMPLEMENTATION
        -DOPENSSL_SMALL
        -D_XOPEN_SOURCE=700
        )
target_compile_options(libcrypto PRIVATE
        -march=armv8-a+crypto
        -fvisibility=hidden
        -Wno-unused-parameter
        -Wall
        -Werror
        -std=c99
        )
